title: Family of victim and survivors of Indianapolis FedEx mass shooting file lawsuit against gun magazine manufacturer and distributors

title: GOP prepared to block vote to replace Feinstein on Senate Judiciary

title: Anti-abortion doctors urge Supreme Court to keep mifepristone restrictions in place
description: A group of doctors opposed to abortion asked the Supreme Court Tuesday to restrict access to a key medication abortion drug while other legal challenges play out, as Wednesday night's deadline for the court to act approaches.

title: McCarthy makes plea for Republicans to back debt ceiling plan

title: Supreme Court seems sympathetic to postal worker who didn't work Sundays in dispute over religious accommodations

title: Iran asks its people to delete WhatsApp from their devices
description: Iranian state television has urged people to remove WhatsApp from their smart phones, alleging without specific evidence that the messaging app gathered user information to send to Israel

title: Eruption of Indonesia's Mount Lewotobi Laki Laki volcano creates ash plume visible 90 miles away
description: Mount Lewotobi Laki Laki volcano in south-central Indonesia has erupted, spewing towering columns of hot ash

title: Danish military using robotic sailboats for surveillance in Baltic and North seas
description: Four uncrewed robotic sailboats known as “Voyagers” have been put into service by the Danish Armed Forces for a three-month trial

title: WhatsApp to start showing ads to users in some parts of the messaging app
description: WhatsApp says that users will start seeing ads in some parts of the app, as owner Meta Platforms moves to a cultivate a new revenue stream by tapping the billions of people that use the messaging service

title: How two satellites are mimicking total solar eclipses in space
description: A pair of European satellites have created the first artificial solar eclipses through precise and fancy formation flying

title: Trump family announces another venture, a mobile phone company
description: The Trump family company says it's launching a mobile phone company, the latest in a string of ventures that have been announced while Donald Trump is in the White House

title: How Prime Video's 'Burn Bar' is changing the way we watch NASCAR
description: NASCAR fans have grown accustomed to seeing speed, throttle and braking on broadcasts for years

title: Republican enthusiasm for Musk cools after his feud with Trump, a new poll finds
description: A new poll finds Elon Musk has lost some of his luster with Republicans since his public falling-out with President Donald Trump

title: Meta invests in AI firm Scale and recruits its CEO for 'superintelligence' team
description: Meta is making a $14.3 billion investment in artificial intelligence company Scale and recruiting its CEO Alexandr Wang to join a team developing “superintelligence” at the tech giant

title: Shooting on Las Vegas Strip near Bellagio that killed 2 was livestreamed, police say
description: A new police report released Thursday says two people killed in a shooting over the weekend on the Las Vegas Strip captured it on video while livestreaming to their shared YouTube channel

title: Space station leak concerns will delay visit by astronauts from India, Poland and Hungary
description: A chartered spaceflight for India, Poland and Hungary's first astronauts in decades has been delayed indefinitely because of leak concerns at the International Space Station

title: A grassland bird eavesdrops on prairie dog calls to keep itself safe from predators
description: New research says long-billed curlews listen to alarm barks from prairie dog colonies to protect themselves from predators

title: AI chatbots need more books to learn from. These libraries are opening their stacks
description: Everything ever said on the internet was just the start of teaching artificial intelligence about humanity

title: Coinbase adds former top Obama and Harris adviser Plouffe as it broadens its political reach
description: Top Democratic strategist David Plouffe is joining Coinbase as an adviser as the cryptocurrency exchange broadens its political reach

title: Nvidia chief calls AI 'the greatest equalizer' but warns Europe risks falling behind
description: Will artificial intelligence save humanity — or destroy it

title: Bayesian yacht that sank off Sicily killing 7 to be raised in late June under updated recovery plan
description: A salvage company plans to lift the luxury yacht Bayesian in late June from the Sicilian seabed where it sank last summer, killing seven people

title: Google offers buyouts to staff in latest round of cost cutting
description: Google has offered buyouts to staff in several divisions in a fresh round of cost cutting, according to a company statement and reports from several news outlets

title: Musk says Tesla's robotaxi service to 'tentatively' launch in Austin on June 22
description: Elon Musk says Tesla is “tentatively” set to begin providing robotaxi service in Austin, Texas, on June 22
